official-title.#text:
To amend titles 23 and 49, United States Code, to modify
		  provisions relating to the length and weight limitations for vehicles operating

text.#text:
The purpose of this subsection is to
				promote conformity with Interstate weight limits to preserve publicly funded
				infrastructure and protect motorists by limiting maximum vehicle weight on key
				portions of the Federal-aid highway system.
